game.name: Pronoun Palace
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Pronoun Palace is a word-spelling roguelike set in a dystopian future where the government has taken your pronouns. Use spells to manipulate letter tiles, catch fish, and abuse amphetamines to defeat the Party and get your pronouns back!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pronoun Palace is a word-spelling roguelike set in a dystopian future where the government has taken your pronouns. Use spells to manipulate letter tiles, catch fish, and abuse amphetamines to defeat the Party and get your pronouns back!
